thread.title: OZANNE, DENNIS

author: OZANNE, DENNIS
title: OZANNE, DENNIS
text:
the grinder Quamar M80 is a very good grinder at a super price . 63 mm burrs , 450 watt motor . case of metal , I have the black one . this grinder is easy to use , can be completely cleaned and put back together easily . the doser works smooth very little / almost nothing from spill . the grind selection is nice - I grind even Turkish grind . the weight is 20+ pounds ! once set it STAYS ! the grinding sound is low .
this is a great machine - I'd buy again , I'd recommend this to anyone home coffee lover .
